page.title: 05RAGLAN HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: {RAGLAN HEALTH CENTRE Raglan Health Centre opened in 1979 it is unique in having only one doctor and in bringing together all the services under one roof of nurses, health visitor and Doctor Beardsmore. The two nurses do dressings,give medicines,injections and syringe ears. The two receptionists look after records and appointments.There are nine surgeries a week.Once a month there is a well baby clinic when babies have their injections.Every Monday afternoon there is a foot clinic for elderly people.The Doctor diagnosis illnesses and gives prescritions to the patients.He orders all the medicines from a wholesaler.The Doctor covers the area to the borders of Usk and the borders of Monmouth.The nurses cover most of the same area.
